participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.
i am married and have five children.
I love bananas because they are a quick and easy snack that can give me a boost of energy during my long runs.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
i want to get married again.

participant_2.background:
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
i am very familiar with hospitals and doctors.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Good thanks! I just got back from the hospital, but now I'm home with my tuna fish salad and some hot chocolate.
I hope you're feeling better! I love hot chocolate and tuna fish salad - what kind of music do you like to listen to while you eat them?
I like to listen to soft rock while I eat, and I like to read mermaid books while I drink my hot chocolate.
Mermaids are my favorite! I love to swim and I've always thought it would be so cool to be able to live in the ocean.
I know, right? They're so beautiful and mysterious. I've always been a little jealous of their ability to breathe underwater.
Me too! I wish I could just swim around and explore the ocean all day long.
I think it would be so amazing to see all the different kinds of fish and plants that live down there.
And the shipwrecks! I would love to explore a shipwreck.
Me too! That would be so cool.
I think we should go on an expedition to find a shipwreck.
That would be awesome! We could bring a boat and scuba gear and everything.
And we could bring some mermaid friends!
That would be the best day ever
